All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddItemFragment
Fragment for adding new items to the inventory.
AddItemFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
interface for button pressed in dialog
AddTagFragment
Fragment for adding and editing tags of an item.
AddTagFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
Interface for button pressed in dialog.
Authenticator
Handles Google authentication via Firebase.
CaptureAct
Extends the CaptureActivity class to create our own barcode scanner instance.
CustomItemListAdapter
Custom adapter that can be filtered and plays well with sorting.
EditItemFragment
Fragment for editing existing items in the inventory.
EditItemFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
Interface for interaction with an item fragment.
FilterRecyclerAdapter
Custom recyclerView adapter to display active filters and allow for removing them by tap.
FirestoreInteract
Class to interact with Firestore.
FirestorePuttable
Implementing this allows for objects to be put into a Firestore database collection.
ImageAdapter
Adapter to display images in a RecyclerView.
ImageAdapter.ItemClickListener
Interface to require images to be clickable.
Item
Represents an item in the inventory and all the data it contains.
ItemDetailsActivity
Activity to view and edit the details and attached information of an individual item.
ItemList
List of items.
ItemListFilterer
Handles sorting and filtering logic of the item list in MainActivity.
ItemListUI
Handles UI functions of the item list in the MainActivity.
MainActivity
Main menu activity.
Tag
User-defineable tag that can be applied to items.
TagList
Custom ArrayList for managing tags.
TagsAdapter
Adapter for RecyclerView meant to show tags such that thy can be horizontally scrolled.
TagSelectionDialog
Dialog utility for selecting tags.
User
Represents a User that can be put onto Firestore.
UserActivity
Activity to sign in a user.
UserLoggedInActivity
Activity to view or log out a currently-logged-in user.
